name: Canine Nature
description: As a fox, you are considerably lighter. You have 9 hearts and canâ€™t wear strong armor as a result of your smaller body. You have decreased reach thanks to your smaller arms and you may only eat meat.

badges.text: You can only wear the armor equivalent of chainmail. You can only eat meat. You lose 2.0 points of health. You have 1 block less of reach. You can't use a shield.
